name: Episode 16 Stuart Does Everything
description: It's not looking good for the football match: Stuart, their best player is completely lethargic. Pat and Stan decide to take care of Stuart and look after all his tasks, which proves harder than they thought.

name: Episode 17 Aunt Martha Moves
description: Aunt Martha is staying with her nephews but she is turning into a bit of a nightmare for Pat and Stan. Professor Chichi offers his help with his latest invention: the Psycho-switch!

name: Episode 18 Roll With It
description: Pat's latest book gives him the confidence to declare his love to Stephanie. He sneaks under Stephanie's window to recite a poem to her, but three hens who were sleeping behind a bush happen to fall madly in love with Pat.

name: Episode 19 True-False Bobo
description: In order to escape having to go to Aunt Martha's with Pat, Stan fakes being sick. The problem is that Pat really becomes sick and his tail starts to grow and grow to worrying proportions...

name: Episode 20 Sting Recall
description: Pat barges in announcing to Stan that Lili will be there shortly to give him his flea shot. Not a great day for Stan...but that's the least of his worries. This very day keeps on repeating itself every time he wakes up!

name: Episode 21 Stephanie Love
description: It's Pat's birthday. Pat and Stan decide to ask the fantastic Stephanie to help prepare the party. Oddly enough, Stephanie does not seem very willing to cooperate. Does she have something to hide?

name: Episode 22 Microstan
description: Stan meets with Professor Chichi to help him test a laser ray which can increase and reduce the size of things. When alone in the lab, Stan accidently turns himself into an ant size creature...

name: Episode 23 The Hamster Of Bengal
description: Stephanie and Pat have offered Stan a hamster to help him calm down. Stephanie thinks the little creature will help his nerves to relax. The problem is the hamster is very aggressive with Stan when no one else is watching.

name: Episode 24 In Search Of Lost Treasure
description: Aunt Martha just came across a strange map in an antique store and invites Pat and Stan to join her in a treasure hunt. With charades, enigmas, adventure and all the rest, what more can you ask for?

name: Episode 25 Pat And Stan Poles
description: A meteorite falls into the garden of Pat and Stan and makes a big seemingly bottomless hole. As our heroes are debating in the garden about how deep the hole is, a loud sound startles them and causes them to jump in the hole.

name: Episode 26 Dig-O-Mania
description: Professor Chichi is in his rocket to go destroy a comet which is threatening earth. It's Pat and Stan who are supposed to press the launch button for the rocket: but Pat has misplaced the launch key!

name: Episode 27 Stan Phone Home
description: Pat's playing at being an extra terrestrial and it's annoying Stan: there are just some subjects you don't mock! He won't look so clever when a real flying saucer lands in the garden!
